name: payment-gateway-multi-tenant
description: Multi-tenant SaaS payment gateway platform with async processing, webhooks, and SDK support

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:frontend: cd frontend/dashboard && npm install && cd ../checkout-widget && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Your Name
